description:
Get your chain sparkling with the help of this chain cleaner. Add some degreaser to the cleaner and let its brushes and sponge do the hard work.

  • Derailleur hook holds the chain cleaner in place, leaving your hands free to pedal
  • 3 rotating brushes cleans your chain from all sides
  • 1 sponge soaks up extra degreaser to keep your work area clean
  • Fill line ensures you use just enough degreaser for the job
  • Top fill port makes it easy to add more degreaser
  • Compatible with all chains
name: MEC Chain Cleaner
